questions.q: How long does a typical project take?
questions.a: Most projects are delivered within 2-6 weeks, depending on complexity. We work in 2-week sprints for maximum transparency.
We work with all common platforms like Zapier, Make, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, CRM systems, and custom APIs. If it has an API, we can probably integrate it.

questions.q: What if I want changes after delivery?
questions.a: All packages include a guarantee period with free adjustments. After that, we offer maintenance contracts from €250/month or can make ad-hoc changes.

questions.q: Do you have experience in my industry?
questions.a: We've completed projects in e-commerce, consultancy, finance, and healthcare. Our approach is process-driven, so we quickly build industry-specific knowledge.
Absolutely. We follow GDPR guidelines, use encrypted connections, and sign NDAs upon request. Data always stays in your own systems.
